name: Lucas & Julian Pokemon Game
description:
How to play Controls

Use W,A,S,D to move around.
Press Space/Enter to select
Press LeftCTRL/Delete to go back
Press Escape to pause
Use the mouse to navigate in menus as well.

Mechanics

Use your current pokemon to duel different type of Lucas, they all have different pokemons with different abilities. You can also change the current abilities of your pokemon in the PokeCenter.
Inside the battle you can:
Fight->Pick one of the 4 available abilities of your pokemon
Change Pokemon-> You can change to any of your pokemons that are currently alive.
Insult-> ehh...
Run-> You have no guts.

Don't forget, if your pokemons are hurt go to the Poke center, you can also swap abilities there! check it out!
